RIDAGEYR: Regular health check-ups are recommended as you age. Consider more frequent monitoring.
BMXBMI: Maintain a healthy weight through balanced diet and regular exercise. Aim for BMI between 18.5-24.9.
BMXWAIST: Reduce waist circumference through diet and exercise. Target waist size: men <40 inches, women <35 inches.
RIAGENDR: Gender-specific health screenings may be recommended. Consult with your healthcare provider.
BPXSY1: Monitor and manage blood pressure. Aim for systolic pressure <120 mmHg through lifestyle changes or medication.
BPXDI1: Monitor and manage blood pressure. Aim for diastolic pressure <80 mmHg through lifestyle changes or medication.
LBXGH: Manage blood sugar levels through diet, exercise, and medication if needed. Target HbA1c <5.7% for normal, <6.5% for prediabetes.
LBXTC: Maintain healthy cholesterol levels through diet and exercise. Target total cholesterol <200 mg/dL.
PAQ605: Increase physical activity. Aim for at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity exercise per week.
PAQ620: Increase physical activity. Aim for at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity exercise per week.
ALQ121: Limit alcohol consumption. Recommended: men ≤2 drinks/day, women ≤1 drink/day.
SMQ020: If you smoke, consider quitting. Smoking significantly increases health risks.
SMQ040: Reduce or quit smoking. Seek support from healthcare providers or smoking cessation programs.
MCQ300A: Family history increases risk. Regular screening and monitoring are recommended.
BMXHT: Height is a non-modifiable factor. Focus on other modifiable risk factors.
BMXWT: Maintain a healthy weight through balanced diet and regular exercise.
